install.name: jTips Team Ladder Dashlet
install.author: jTips
install.license: Commercial - Do not modify or redistribute
install.description: jTips Team Ladder Dashlet displays a summary of the current team ladder. Requires jTips 2.1 or higher. Must be displayed in the jTipsDash module position.

param.name: load_mootools
param.label: Load mootools
param.description: Loads mootools with this module. Only required if your template does not include mootols by default.

param.name: incimage
param.label: Show Team Logos
param.description: Displays the mini team logo if available

param.name: team_field
param.label: Team Field
param.description: Select which field from the teams will be shown
